entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening and after midnight. 40 percent chance of flurries over northern sections overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. 40 percent chance of flurries over northern sections in the morning. Snow level 900 metres. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
